崖刻.definition: rock carving; cliff engraving; words carved into cliff face

崖岸.definition: cliff; steep slope; fig. arrogant and difficult person

崖州.definition: ancient name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]

崖沙燕.definition: (bird species of China) sand martin (Riparia riparia)

崖海鴉.definition: (bird species of China) common murre (Uria aalge)

崖限.definition: cliff barring the way; fig. brick wall
